cron.description: Lease all tasks from the dns-pull queue, group by TLD, and invoke PublishDnsUpdates for each group.
Synchronize Registrar entities to Google Spreadsheets.
This job resaves all our resources, projected in time to "now". It is needed for "deleteOldCommitLogs" to work correctly.

This job deletes unreferenced commit logs from Datastore that are older than thirty days. Since references are only updated on save, if we want to delete "unneeded" commit logs, we also need "resaveAllEppResources" to run periodically.

This job runs a mapreduce that processes batch asynchronous deletions of contact and host resources by mapping over all EppResources and checking for any references to the contacts/hosts in pending deletion.
This job runs a mapreduce that asynchronously handles DNS refreshes for host renames by mapping over all domains and creating DNS refresh tasks for any domains that reference a renamed host.
Syncs RegistrarContact changes in the past hour to Google Groups.
This job runs an action that deletes domains that are past their autorenew end date.
This job runs an action that deletes all data in Cloud SQL.
This job runs an action that deletes all data in Cloud Datastore.
Replays recent commit logs from Datastore to the SQL secondary backend.
